name: HEKTOR (itch)
description:
Finally! Something innovative!

Hektor is a captivating and honestly challenging match-4 arcade game of the old school and not just another "match-3-gems-bubbles-candies-or-whatever-to-annoying-music-kind-of-game"!

The goal of Hektor is to match 100 tiles each level. Find cross-shaped combinations of at least four pieces in a size-changing, chaotic playing field. Be careful not to click wrongly or you have to collect even more tiles.

The clock is ticking! However, combining three stars in a row will provide you with a time bonus. So, better react quickly and use your bonuses and power-ups wisely if you want to beat your high score. Enjoy infinite, randomly generated levels and a variety of skins.

This is not the next Bejeweled. But maybe that's a good thing!


Hektor has:

  • Unusual, innovative play principle
  • Challenging playing field
  • Infinite levels
  • Bonuses and power-ups
  • Super cool sounds
  • A variety of designs
  • Lots of love
